```{r, include = FALSE}
library(RtD3)

```


```{r, fig.height = 12, out.width = "100%"}
today <- Sys.Date()
rtData <- list("Cases" = RtD3::readInEpiNow2(path = here::here("data", "rt", today)))
RtD3::summaryWidget(rtData = rtData)
```
